https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i8Fo2xWyiSpP5JizJjkHRTFYtas.jpg Madeline Baggett is an astronomer who searches for life beyond Earth, and when she believes she has found it. With refractors, telescopes, and a small film crew in tow, Madeline arrives and sets up in Summit Ridge where she meets widowed National Park Ranger Ryan Sparks and his young daughter, Celeste. With Ryanâ€™s help, Madeline begins to chart the celestial event which brings the pair closer to finding love under the stars. A Christmas Star
